author: powercode
body:
As a newbie on the project, I find it hard to build an understanding of the workings of the engine from reading the code.
It would help a lot with a document describing the design of the engine as a whole but also of the different subsystem.

I don't think it has to be that detailed as we have the source but at least for me it has been hard to build the understanding from the bottom up.
title: Provide overview of engine design
